name: Easter Eggztravaganza
description:
Everywhere in this amazing Easter
Wonderland is crammed full of Easter
Eggs, bunnies, sweets and fabulous
toys. Mum takes Mike and Sally to
get fresh laid eggs from the farm, then
they come home to paint them.
Meanwhile, the Easter Bunny runs past
and leaves eggs all over the backyard
for them to find. Next, the family go
downtown to the shopping centre,
then visit Auntie Janetâ€™s house, before
going to the nearby church for the
ultimate Mega Easter Egg Hunt. Play
captivating mini games such as
spot-the-difference, jigsaw puzzles
and many more in an Easter
Eggztravaganza for all the family to
enjoy.
